pullRequest.title: Tests zipkin-server/README.md instructions for building server on each pull request
pullRequest.bodyText:
We still get questions about windows not building properly. This
uses GitHub actions to help ensure we don't break by accident, or at least
so we automatically know if at least one windows environment works.
Thanks to curiostack for the reference! https://github.com/curioswitch/curiostack/blob/master/.github/workflows/continuous-build.yml
See #1501

beforeCommit.message:
Adds Appveyor to build windows by default

We still get questions about windows not building properly. This
uses Appveyor to help ensure we don't break by accident, or at least
so we automatically know if at least one windows environment works.

See #1501

nodes.bodyText:
Nit: either

Execute Build: Server
Execute Server Build

Was wondering what the cool build server is :)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+name: Continuous Build Server
+on: [push, pull_request]
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+    name: Build Server
+    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
+    strategy:
+      matrix:
+        os:
+          - macos-latest
+          - ubuntu-latest
+          - windows-latest
+    steps:
+      - name: Checkout Repository
+        uses: actions/checkout@v1
+        with:
+          fetch-depth: 10
+      - name: Cache NPM Packages
+        uses: actions/cache@v1
+        with:
+          path: ~/.npm
+          key: npm-packages
+      - name: Cache Maven Modules
+        uses: actions/cache@v1
+        with:
+          path: ~/.m2/repository
+          key: m2-repository
+      - name: Cache Maven Wrapper
+        uses: actions/cache@v1
+        with:
+         path: .mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.jar
+         key: mvn-wrapper
+      - name: Execute Build Server

nodes.bodyText: Think want --batch-mode like in publish.sh to reduce tons of log spam
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+name: Continuous Build Server
+on: [push, pull_request]
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+    name: Build Server
+    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
+    strategy:
+      matrix:
+        os:
+          - macos-latest
+          - ubuntu-latest
+          - windows-latest
+    steps:
+      - name: Checkout Repository
+        uses: actions/checkout@v1
+        with:
+          fetch-depth: 10
+      - name: Cache NPM Packages
+        uses: actions/cache@v1
+        with:
+          path: ~/.npm
+          key: npm-packages
+      - name: Cache Maven Modules
+        uses: actions/cache@v1
+        with:
+          path: ~/.m2/repository
+          key: m2-repository
+      - name: Cache Maven Wrapper
+        uses: actions/cache@v1
+        with:
+         path: .mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.jar
+         key: mvn-wrapper
+      - name: Execute Build Server
+        run: ./mvnw -DskipTests --also-make -pl zipkin-server clean install
